channel.title: Calli on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Calli on funPlantGenes

item.title: CrWRKY42
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrWRKY42 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 42 Genome: Species: Citrus clementina Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CrWRKY42 coregulates chlorophyll degradation and carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsELT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g11690 Gene Symbol: CsELT1 Gene Name: Esterase/lipase/thioesterase 1 Genome: sweet orange (Citrus sinensis) reference genome Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsELT1 promotes the accumulation of β-chain carotenoids in plastid globules by forming a fat-soluble environment rich in triacylglycerol (TGA).

item.title: CsERF061
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsERF061 Gene Name: group I ethylene response factor 61 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Ethylene activation of carotenoid biosynthesis by a novel transcription factor CsERF061.

item.title: CsMADS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs7g10980.3 Gene Symbol: CsMADS3 Gene Name: MADS-box transcription factor 3 Genome: Citrus sinensis Valencia genome v1.

item.title: CsMADS5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMADS5 Gene Name: FRUITFULL sub-clade MADS 5 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A fruit ripening-associated transcription factor CsMADS5 positively regulates carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsNAC7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsNAC7 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsULT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsULT1 Gene Name: ultrapetala transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: Identification, cloning and characterization of an ultrapetala transcription factor CsULT1 from Crocus: a novel regulator of apocarotenoid biosynthesis.

item.title: DsRed2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DsRed2 Gene Name: Ds Red fluorescent protein 2 Genome: Species: Discosoma Functional Descriptions: Red fluorescent protein (DsRed2), an ideal reporter for cotton genetic transformation and molecular breeding.

item.title: GmAMADH2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma06g19820 Gene Symbol: GmAMADH2 Gene Name: amino aldehyde dehydrogenase2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Deficiency in the amino aldehyde dehydrogenase encoded by GmAMADH2, the homologue of rice Os2AP, enhances 2-acetyl-1-pyrroline biosynthesis in soybeans.

item.title: IbLEA14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbLEA14 Gene Name: Late embryogenesis abundant 14 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: Sweetpotato late embryogenesis abundant 14 (IbLEA14) gene influences lignification and increases osmotic- and salt stress-tolerance of transgenic calli.

item.title: MdBBX20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000800387 Gene Symbol: MdBBX20 Gene Name: B-box zinc finger protein 20 Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdBBX22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD11G1269800 , MDP0000298804 Gene Symbol: MdBBX22 Gene Name: B-box gene 22 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdBGLU40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD16G1062800 Gene Symbol: MdBGLU40 Gene Name: Malus domestica beta-glucosidase 40 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdCAIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000118899 Gene Symbol: MdCAIP1 Gene Name: C2-domain ABA Insensitive Protein1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: An Apple Protein Kinase MdSnRK1.

item.title: MdCBF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD07G1262900 Gene Symbol: MdCBF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdCBF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1196100 Gene Symbol: MdCBF2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdCIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000230486 Gene Symbol: MdCIP1 Gene Name: COP1-interacting protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Expression pattern analysis showed that MdCIP1 was constitutively expressed in various tissues of apple, and responded to stress and hormone signals at the transcriptional level.

item.title: MdERF109
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD05G1080900 Gene Symbol: MdERF109 Gene Name: Malus domestica ethylene response factor 109 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdERF118
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD16G1043500 Gene Symbol: MdERF118 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdERF1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdERF1B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The ethylene response factor MdERF1B regulates anthocyanin and proanthocyanidin biosynthesis in apple.

item.title: MdGAD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdGAD1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdGAD1 was identified as a possible key gene for GABA synthesis in apple.

item.title: MdHY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000586302 Gene Symbol: MdHY5 Gene Name: Malus domestica LONG HYPOCOTYL 5 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdLAC7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD04G0113100 Gene Symbol: MdLAC7 Gene Name: laccase 7 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The detailed analysis identified MdLAC7’s (laccase 7) role in the preharvest apple peel browning process.

item.title: MdLNC499
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD05G1080800 Gene Symbol: MdLNC499 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdMa12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMa12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of apple Ma12, a mitochondrial pyrophosphatase pump gene, leads to malic acid accumulation and the upregulation of malate dehydrogenase in tomato and apple calli.

item.title: MdMYB11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1184000 Gene Symbol: MdMYB11 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 11 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD14G1189300 Gene Symbol: MdMYB1r1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdMYB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000659260 Gene Symbol: MdMYB21 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdMYB21 was significantly associated with fruit malic acid content, accounting for ~7.

item.title: MdMYB23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000230141 Gene Symbol: MdMYB23 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 23 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: R2R3-MYB transcription factor MdMYB23 is involved in the cold tolerance and proanthocyanidin accumulation in apple.

item.title: MdMYB6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1288600 Gene Symbol: MdMYB6 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdMYB73
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000894463 Gene Symbol: MdMYB73 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 73 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1217200 Gene Symbol: MdMYB8 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdMYB9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD08G1070700 Gene Symbol: MdMYB9 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 9 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdMYBPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYBPA1 Gene Name: PA1-type MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The proanthocyanidin-specific transcription factor MdMYBPA1 initiates anthocyanin synthesis under low-temperature conditions in red-fleshed apples.

item.title: MdSAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdSAT1 encodes a bHLHm1 transcription factor involved in salinity and drought responses.

item.title: MdSWEET9b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSWEET9b Gene Name: sugars will eventually be exported transporter Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid and regulation of the sugar transporter gene MdSWEET9b promote apple sugar accumulation.

item.title: MdTMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1005100 Gene Symbol: MdTMT1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdTST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1005100 Gene Symbol: MdTST1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD10G1142100 Gene Symbol: MdTST2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD00G1140800 Gene Symbol: MdWRKY1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdWRKY33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdWRKY33 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdWRKY33 binds to the MdGAD1 promoter and activates its transcription.

item.title: MtSERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtSERF1 Gene Name: SOMATIC EMBRYO RELATED FACTOR1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor MtSERF1 of the ERF subfamily identified by transcriptional profiling is required for somatic embryogenesis induced by auxin plus cytokinin in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: MxMPK4-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1069100 Gene Symbol: MxMPK4-1 Gene Name: Malus xiaojinensis Mitogen-activated protein kinase 4-1 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MxRBOHD2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1128500 Gene Symbol: MxRBOHD2 Gene Name: Malus xiaojinensis Mitogen-activated protein kinase 4-1 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: Noemi
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g31400 Gene Symbol: Noemi Gene Name: bHLH protein Genome: Citrus sinensis Valencia genome v1.

item.title: OsOr
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g43500 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0651300 Gene Symbol: OsOr Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PbrbZIP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbrbZIP15 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: PbrbZIP15, was characterized from pear genome through the combined analyses of metabolite and transcriptome data followed by experimental validation.

item.title: PcERF5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PcERF5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus communis Functional Description: We then verified the function of PcERF5 in regulating anthocyanin accumulation by genetic transformation in both pear skin and apple calli.

item.title: PpyABF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpyABF3 Gene Name: ABRE-BINDING FACTOR3 Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: PpyABF3 recruits the COMPASS-like complex to regulate bud dormancy maintenance via integrating ABA signaling and GA catabolism.

item.title: PuMYB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuMYB21 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 21 Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuMYB21 and PuMYB54, from “Nanguo” pears, which were notably expressed in response to cold stress and during the peel-browning process.

item.title: PuMYB54
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuMYB54 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 21 Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuMYB21 and PuMYB54, from “Nanguo” pears, which were notably expressed in response to cold stress and during the peel-browning process.

item.title: PuRBOHF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuRBOHF Gene Name: respiratory burst oxidase homolog Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: Production of reactive oxygen species by PuRBOHF is critical for stone cell development in pear fruit.

item.title: RhPLATZ9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhPLATZ9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: The RhWRKY33a-RhPLATZ9 regulatory module delays petal senescence by suppressing rapid reactive oxygen species accumulation in rose flowers.

item.title: RhWRKY33a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhWRKY33a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: The RhWRKY33a-RhPLATZ9 regulatory module delays petal senescence by suppressing rapid reactive oxygen species accumulation in rose flowers.

item.title: RsMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RsMYB1 Gene Name: Bordeaux anthocyanin regulator Genome: Species: Raphanus sativus Functional Descriptions: Transposon-induced methylation of the RsMYB1 promoter disturbs anthocyanin accumulation in red-fleshed radish.

item.title: SmCAD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: d4_transcript_44168 Gene Symbol: SmCAD7 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Salix matsudana Functional Description: SmCAD7and SmCCR1increased lignin content and enhanced the Cd tolerance in poplar calli.

item.title: SmCCR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: d4_transcript_16062 Gene Symbol: SmCCR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Salix matsudana Functional Description: SmCAD7and SmCCR1increased lignin content and enhanced the Cd tolerance in poplar calli.

item.title: VvBBX44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_200s0347g00030 Gene Symbol: VvBBX44 Gene Name: Vitis vinifera B-box protein 44 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Our previous work has shown that Vitis vinifera B-box protein 44 (VvBBX44) inhibits anthocyanin synthesis and represses VvHY5 expression in grape calli.

item.title: VvSnRK1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_00025806001 Gene Symbol: VvSnRK1.1 Gene Name: SNF1-related protein kinase catalytic subunit alpha KIN10 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: VvTOR interacts with VvSnRK1.

item.title: VvTOR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvTOR Gene Name: serine/threonine-protein kinase TOR Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: VvTOR interacts with VvSnRK1.
